purpose: To simplify the creation of multiplayer web games by managing backend services and networking, allowing developers to focus on game logic and design.
principle: Provides a framework for game developers using JavaScript/TypeScript and popular web frameworks, abstracting backend and networking tasks.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API support for seamless integration into various web game projects, compatible with multiple frontend frameworks.
limitations: Currently in alpha, which may include limited features and potential instability. Primarily focused on web-based games.
